name: VZVirtioFileSystemDeviceConfiguration
desc: An object that represents the configuration of a Virtio file system device.

items.name: init(tag: String)
items.desc: Creates a configuration for a VIRTIO file system device.

items.name: var share: VZDirectoryShare?
items.desc: A value that define how the host exposes resources to the guest virtual machine.

items.name: var tag: String
items.desc: A label that identifies this device in the guest VM.

items.name: class func validateTag(String)
items.desc: Checks to see whether a VIRTIO tag is valid.
